title: Duke Nukem 2
notes: The 1993 game. Same as first one. DOSBox opens into command line mode, but it doesn't start the game.

title: Duke Nukem 2
notes: To launch, use DosBox's Quick Launch under main menu to select executable

title: Duke Nukem 2
notes:
(Not available in store)
To get it to run you need to perform these steps:

1, add this line in the launch option to the game in steam:
-conf "/FULL-PATH-TO-STEAMLIBRARY/steamapps/common/Duke Nukem 2/Nukem2.conf"

2, open NUKEM2.conf in a text editor, and:
replace this "Mount C: .."
with this "mount c /FULL-PATH-TO-STEAMLIBRARY/steamapps/common/Duke Nukem 2"

after that the game loads/runs perfectly

title: NBA 2K18
notes: The game runs fine, some minor issue, but the online doesn't work. Please fix it, the game can't connect at 2K servers.
